unnormalised: Arrey yaar, ICSE-ant 90% mellounk zodd! Mhojea bhavan bore mark mellouche khatir dis ani raat abhyas kelo. Mhaka aikunk ailem ki CBSE-chi poriksha hea vorsakui khub kathan asa, khas korun maths ani science. Apnea sogllea vidhyarthiak subecha je class 10 ani 12-chi poriksha diunk asat! Result sadharanponnim May 15 te June 10chea sumarak yetat, mhunn dekhun nodor dovrat. Punn chinta korunk naka, mark sogllech nhoi! Path korchya bodlek, shikxonn ani vishoy samajpak laksh diunk zai.
normalised: Arrey yaar, I-C-S-E-nt nabbay takke mellounk zodd! Mhozo bhav-bhoinn boro score mellounk dis-raat shikonk laglo. Mhaka aikunk ailem ki C-B-S-E cheo porxaunneo legit chodd kotthin asat hea vorosa, khas korun gonnit ani vigyan. Class dha ani bara porxaunnek bosloleank boreponn! Result sadharanponnim May pandhra te June dha meren yetat, dekhun lokx divnk zai. Punn chint'ta korunk naka, mark mhunnje soglle nhoi! Paath korun xikpa bodlek xikpacher ani vichar somzopacher dhyan dium.
text: Arrey yaar, ICSE-ant 90% mellounk zodd! Mhojea bhavan bore mark mellouche khatir dis ani raat abhyas kelo. Mhaka aikunk ailem ki CBSE-chi poriksha hea vorsakui khub kathan asa, khas korun maths ani science. Apnea sogllea vidhyarthiak subecha je class 10 ani 12-chi poriksha diunk asat! Result sadharanponnim May 15 te June 10chea sumarak yetat, mhunn dekhun nodor dovrat. Punn chinta korunk naka, mark sogllech nhoi! Path korchya bodlek, shikxonn ani vishoy samajpak laksh diunk zai.
